question: I would like to know if I am allowed to burry my wife even if her father and brothers arealive and at the funeral. Can I go into the kabr and burry her?
answer:
QUESTION

I would like to know if I am allowed to burry my wife even if her father and brothers arealive and at the funeral.  Can I go into the kabr and burry her?  If you answer NO then please explain and if YES also explain.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is permissible for a husband to bury his wife in the presence of her father and brothers. (Fatawaa Rahimiyyah, vol 5, pg 65)

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Ml. Ya'qoob Dadabhai,
Student Darul Iftaa
